courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Agricultural Extension and Innovation
courses.description: This program prepares students to facilitate knowledge transfer and innovation adoption in agricultural communities.

course_units.title: Introduction to Agricultural Extension
course_units.description: Overview of agricultural extension principles and practices.

course_units.title: Communication Skills for Extension
course_units.description: Effective communication strategies for agricultural extension.

course_units.title: Rural Sociology
course_units.description: Study of rural communities and social structures.

course_units.title: Extension Methods and Approaches
course_units.description: Various methods and approaches used in agricultural extension.

course_units.title: Agricultural Innovation Systems
course_units.description: Understanding and facilitating innovation in agricultural systems.

course_units.title: ICT in Agricultural Extension
course_units.description: Use of information and communication technologies in agricultural extension.

course_units.title: Program Planning in Extension
course_units.description: Planning and designing effective extension programs.

course_units.title: Participatory Rural Appraisal
course_units.description: Participatory methods for assessing rural needs and resources.

course_units.title: Extension Administration and Management
course_units.description: Management and administration of extension organizations and programs.

course_units.title: Group Dynamics in Extension
course_units.description: Understanding and facilitating group processes in extension work.

course_units.title: Agricultural Education
course_units.description: Principles and practices of education in agricultural settings.

course_units.title: Gender and Agricultural Development
course_units.description: Gender considerations in agricultural extension and development.

course_units.title: Extension Program Evaluation
course_units.description: Methods and approaches for evaluating extension programs.

course_units.title: Agricultural Knowledge Management
course_units.description: Management of knowledge in agricultural innovation systems.

course_units.title: Extension Capstone Project
course_units.description: Independent research project in agricultural extension.

course_units.title: Agricultural Policy and Extension
course_units.description: Analysis of agricultural policies and their implications for extension.

course_units.title: Extension Internship
course_units.description: Practical experience in agricultural extension organizations.
